data.description: This playbook retrieves the Iris Investigate profile of domain and automatically identifies potential connected infrastructure related to artifacts based on DomainTools Guided Pivot value. The pivot value is set based off of a configurable custom list.
data.notes:
Create a custom list with the name: 
domaintools_guided_pivot

This holds a list of pivot values for each of the pivots that the PB runs, the names need to be the same, and the integer pivot values can be configured: 
column1 | column2
max_registrant_contact_name_count | 200
max_registrant_org_count	| 200
max_ssl_info_organization_count | 200
max_ssl_info_hash_count	| 350
max_name_server_host_count	| 200
max_soa_email_count | 200
max_ip_address_count | 150
max_name_server_ip_count | 250
max_mx_ip_count | 200
